body:
Similar to #13995 , Spack fails to build application binaries for openfoam-org.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openfoam-org@7+metis %gcc@7.4.0
(Build sucessfully)
$ ls /openfoam-org/platforms/linux64GccDPInt32RpathOpt/bin
(empty)
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 3.10.0-862.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Apr 20 16:44:24 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
```
title: Installation issue: openfoam-org@6 and openfoam-org@7
